author: Ted Byrne
content:
There's a theatrical mood here. A New York stage thing. A hoofer works his way across the boards. Light, floating at the top of his form. You make it there, you make it anywhere. He's got a role on Broadway, the music's light just now, working toward the big finish. Get ready for a standing O.

Nice!

Thanks for sharing
Ted
